data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Woroba, Côte d‘Ivoire to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Woroba, Côte d‘Ivoire
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 13,945 believers in Woroba against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary: On average, 11 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Woroba, Côte d‘Ivoire.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Woroba, Côte d‘Ivoire.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Woroba, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Wolof people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 13,945 believers in Woroba, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Woroba to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who are far from you in Woroba. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Woroba
location.people_groups_list: Wobe, Tura, Kla-Dan, Senoufo,Tagwana, Jula, Koyaga
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Wobe (279,000), Tura (73,000), Kla-Dan (31,000), Senoufo,Tagwana (257,000), Jula, Koyaga (88,000)
